settings.text: Wool mid layer is an essential item for every winter outdoor activity. Regulating your body temperature and wicking moisture away from your body, this men's alpaca sweater will keep you extra warm and comfortable in cold weather and snow. Our 100% Royal Alpaca Wool insulating thermal sweatshirts are specifically designed for extreme outdoor adventures. Our wool sweatshirts work the best as mid layers for skiing, snowboarding and hiking, but can also be styled and used casually in the city. Explore nature and stay active in cold winter temperatures with our alpaca wool mid layers.
